title: Website Redesign
description: Redesigned a corporate website for a client. The project began with a comprehensive analysis of the existing site to identify areas for improvement. I collaborated closely with stakeholders to gather requirements and understand their vision. The redesign focused on enhancing user experience and modernizing the visual appeal. I created wireframes and mockups to present design concepts. Feedback from the client was incorporated at every stage. The new design emphasized intuitive navigation and accessibility. I implemented a responsive layout to ensure compatibility across devices. The color scheme was updated to align with the client's brand identity. Typography choices were made to improve readability and professionalism. I optimized images and assets for faster loading times. The homepage was restructured to highlight key services and offerings. Interactive elements were added to engage visitors. I integrated a content management system for easy updates. SEO best practices were followed to improve search engine rankings. The site architecture was reorganized for better content flow. I conducted usability testing with real users to gather insights. Issues identified during testing were promptly addressed. The final design received positive feedback from both the client and users. I ensured cross-browser compatibility for a consistent experience. Security measures were implemented to protect user data. The project included training sessions for the client's staff. Documentation was provided for future maintenance. I set up analytics to monitor site performance. The redesign resulted in increased traffic and user engagement. I worked with developers to implement the design efficiently. Regular meetings kept the project on track and within budget. The client appreciated the transparent communication throughout. I managed the timeline to meet the launch deadline. Post-launch support was offered to resolve any issues. The website now reflects the client's values and goals. I utilized modern web technologies for scalability. The project showcased my skills in design and project management. I coordinated with copywriters to refine website content. Accessibility standards were met for all users. The navigation menu was simplified for ease of use. I added call-to-action buttons to drive conversions. The footer was redesigned to include important links and contact information. I created custom graphics to enhance visual interest. The site was tested on various screen sizes and resolutions. I implemented feedback forms to gather user opinions. The project involved troubleshooting technical challenges. I ensured the website was optimized for mobile devices. The client was involved in decision-making at every step. I provided recommendations for ongoing improvements. The redesign improved brand perception and credibility. I used analytics data to inform design decisions. The project was completed ahead of schedule. I maintained a focus on quality throughout the process. The client reported increased inquiries after launch. I documented all changes for future reference. The website now serves as a valuable marketing tool. I am proud of the successful outcome and client satisfaction.

title: Brand Campaign
description: Executed a full brand campaign for a startup.
